_sText:
Hi 

i have fixed valera3132 best_car_prefab(fix), wen you are uppside down in the car press enter and the car will flip over like normal again and the camera view will be normal. now its more fun you can drive fast and jump and get out normal.  


My Monster Polise car are just for fun =) its not 100% finnish i still have to work with it. just jump inside the car and drive, Press left mouse to shoot and Right mouse to start the police sound =) 
This will be great to use to ba_jail map police chase terorist ore other maps =)

I m using KREVE setting to my car.

Have fun =)
